    • types/ContentItem.js

     /**
 * Defines a **Content Item** in the CMS
 * @typedef ContentItem
 * @memberof AgilityManagement.Types
 * @property {number} contentID - The unique ID of the content item in this language.
 * @property {AgilityManagement.Types.SystemProperties} properties - The system properties of the content item.
 * @property {Object} fields - A dictionary of the fields and the values of the content item.
 * @property {Object} [seo] - Any SEO related fields for the content item. This is only returned for Dynamic Page Items.
 */
